director.name: 杰拉多·奥利瓦雷斯 Gerardo Olivares

introduction: It tells the story of Cándido Sandoval, a gaucho who was born 70 years ago in the heart of Patagonia. He lives alone in a shack, cut off from everything. His day-to-day problems may appear straightforward to us, but to him, they are a matter of survival in an extremely hostile environment. His closest neighbour lives 45 minutes away on horseback... However, their lives are marked by old territorial disputes. An unexpected form of solidarity will arise between them both when the cruel winter leaves one of them at death’s door.
